subject: How come  and  tasks don't take filesets?
msgSnippet: It s a bit tedious to have to create a separate  element in my build xml for each compressed file I have.  Why can t we use filesets here?

my bui=
ld xml for each compressed file I have.  Why can't we use
filesets here?
